comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I think there’s a bug in /v1/event_names wherein it’s bypassing the whitelist. In the meanwhile, I’ve gone through the whitelist and blessed a bunch of discovered events so the majority of them should show up on /v1/event_details now.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: No ETA; but it’s on the backlog now at least.

comments.author: MaxL.1496
comments.body:
It seems /v1/event_names and /v1/event_details are not syncronized because /v1/event_names has much more events listed than /v1/event_details (for ex. details lists only 2 in Auric Basin).

Any ETA when it will be fixed?
